message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,300,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $950,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't sell this product for less than $1,200,000.  It holds significant value that justifies this price.
Alice, I understand your position, but I believe I can only offer $1,100,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests.
